content.en: Chlorophyll estimation: Scientists have been studying how to accurately estimate chlorophyll concentration in various aquatic systems. They have been using algorithms to optimize spectral bands and models to estimate chlorophyll-a concentration in different types of water bodies, such as hyper-eutrophic systems, turbid estuaries, and inland lakes. These algorithms have been calibrated, validated, and compared to find the most effective ones for estimating chlorophyll-a concentration in different water conditions.
content.da: Klorofylbestemmelse: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan man præcist kan estimere klorofylkoncentration i forskellige akvatiske systemer. De har brugt algoritmer til at optimere spektalbånd og modeller til at estimere klorofyl-a-koncentration i forskellige typer af vandområder, såsom hypereutrofe systemer, uklare flodmundinger og indsøer. Disse algoritmer er blevet kalibreret, valideret og sammenlignet for at finde de mest effektive metoder til at estimere klorofyl-a-koncentration under forskellige vandforhold.
